name: Alchemia
overview: Alchemia is an action platform game. Written in Polish. The story begins when Berediusz wakes up in a strange place. To return to the home the player must find the indicated number of amphoras on each of the four levels. The task is complicated by the passage of time and the numerous creatures inhabiting the maze. The contact with the hostile objects means a loss of the energy, the fall on spikes - instant death.
